Using the mtcars dataset, give three ways using R code to output the mpg and qsec of all Toyota cars.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars <- mtcars
mtcars2 <- mtcars

#Option one
mtcars[c("Toyota Corolla", "Toyota Corona"), c("mpg", "qsec")]

#Option two
mtcars2<- as_data_frame(mtcars2, rownames = "name")
mtcars2 |>
  filter(name == "Toyota Corolla" | name == "Toyota Corona") |>
  select(mpg, qsec)

#Option three
mtcars3 <- mtcars2 |>
  select(name, mpg, qsec)
mtcars3[mtcars3$name == "Toyota Corolla" | mtcars3$name == "Toyota Corona", ]
```
